conclusion: To solve the problem, we need to analyze the given displacement-time graph and determine how many times the speed of the particle is 5 m/s during the interval from t = 0 to t = 4 s.
Speed is the absolute value of the velocity. Velocity is the derivative of displacement with respect to time, i.e., v = dx/dt. Therefore, the speed |v| is |dx/dt|.
The slope of the tangent line to the curve at any point gives the instantaneous velocity at that point.

premise: The slope of the tangent line to the curve at any point gives the instantaneous velocity at that point.
conclusion: We need to find the points where the magnitude of the slope (the absolute value of the velocity) is equal to 5 m/s.
